page.title: 06EFFECT OF APPLEBY NEW FAIR
page.content: Swarthy types from towns gather here for a cheap annual holiday and get- together.Some are horse dealers,some no doubt are decent folk,some are out for what they can get.Showing off horses on roads they get obstinately in the way & the road to Appleby is even closed for 3 days during horse sales.We stay near home.There are extra policemen,yet things disappear. We become suspicious of strangers, always on our guard.Our attitude may make them worse,but there is usually trouble somewhere & we remain tense. Youths take lurchers into the woods & annoy the gamekeeper,woods and hedges are also used for dumping rubbish and worse.This is how the locals feel & they pay the bills for police & garbage clearance. On TV it is all romance & charm, & a great attraction to tourists.
